rules.query: PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> ASK { NOT EXISTS { ?p a schema:Person . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?p schema:name ?n ; schema:email ?e ; schema:age ?a ; schema:jobTitle ?j } } }
rules.message: All Persons must have name, email, age, and jobTitle
